column5: Yet Another Problem For Our Fishing Future In Ontario  This is how I heard about it.  http://forums.fishontario.com/thread.jspa;...355?  The newspaper article is found here.  http://newsfeed.recorder.ca/cgi-bin/LiveIQ...$rec=24746  OFAH solution for this right across the province  http://www.ofah.org/News/index.cfm?ID=3&am...Doc&DID=379  Entropy

Yup, that was me over there.  I have posted this on a few forums, as it needs to be heard.  I have been in contact with the MNR already, but only to leave info to it.  They are going to check into it.  Now off to OFAH.
Just talked to one of the head guys at the OFAH.  He hasn't even heard a rumour about this yet.  He's checking it out and going to be in contact with the club there to see what is up.

They would have got an email from me a half hour ago.  I say we all head down there and protest, put some signs on our fish'n rods and wave that around!!  CHARGE ME FOR HAVING A FISHING ROD IN HAND ?? what the heck  Entropy

Wow, that was fast !!  Just got an email back from OFAH, email has been passed to the appropriate persons, they are looking into it.  Membership dollars hard at work.  Hey, who wants to buy a OFAH lottery ticket from me?  Entropy
